price: 2. qui, lorsqu’ils font peser (ce qu’ils achètent), exigent la pleine mesure,
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna idhā ik'tālū ʿalā al-nāsi yastawfūna
